website_summaries.verdict: A huggable Mickey Mouse that makes a great bedtime buddy or take-along pal.
pros: Mickey Mouse enthusiasts of all ages will love being able to snuggle their favorite character
Excellent quality and convincing design with Mickey’s signature clothing
cons: It's an authentic stuffed Mickey Mouse, but it may show wear quickly

customer_reviews.title: Misleading!!
customer_reviews.text: What you receive is not at all what is listed in the picture! Listed is a Mickey Mouse with club house packaging and perfect for gift giving.. what you get is a Mickey Mouse just stuffed in a generic cardboard box that reads "Mickey Mouse" It was a bit disappointing as this is a birthday gift. I would highly recommend that the listing be corrected to reflect what you actually receive
customer_reviews.author: r0908

customer_reviews.title: Not as Advertised- No box or ear tag
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and very soft. Excited to gift to my niece for Christmas. However was disappointed that there was no ear tag or box. She loves Mickey Mouse Clubhouse so I wanted her to see the logos when she opened it. Makes it not feel new. Bought from this seller because the image shown had Mickey in a box.
customer_reviews.author: D. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cuddly!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to an autistic child I drive to school because she has Mickey's Clubhouse on her ipad. She immediately smiled and hugged him, and it's something we leave in the van just for her, to help soothe her during anxious moments. He is very soft and cuddly and would be the friend of anyone who loves Mickey!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Bundy

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This Mickey is perfect in every way. It's large, soft, adorable, comes in original packaging and shipped/got delivered fast! Awesome quality my son is so happy. He got it early because it is just learning to talk and he can't stop saying *MICKEYYYY*. This was a great gift! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement Mickey for one that was dropped into a mud puddle and since it sang couldn’t be washed. This is perfect and my daughter is happier with this one than the old one that “got sick”
customer_reviews.author: ruisseau

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and cuddly!
customer_reviews.text: This is the classic style of a super soft, stuffed Mickey Mouse. It was a Christmas gift for my adult, intellectualy delayed cousin who loves Mickey Mouse. She was all smiles and giggles when she opened the box. It came in a simple cardboard box without a hundred plastic tags or plastic bands attached or plastic molding around it. And no chemical odor. A Mickey Mouse fan will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dragonsparx

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, and good size for 2 year old to hug.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty Good quality, you can take off/put on the shorts. Ears feel a like there is some stiff material in them but I think they and will probably get soft over time. My yep year old loves it. Would but again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Charming Mickey
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fellow for a gift, he is soft, cuddly and perfect for small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Waldoh1

customer_reviews.title: Cute but stitching is weak
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my two year old, with the exception of the fact that two holes emerged a day after I gave it to him. I don’t know if they were there before, but my son is not very rough. I’m pretty disappointed in the quality. It is very soft and cute but needs to be constructed better.
customer_reviews.author: Adam C Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.. love it
customer_reviews.text: My almost 2 year old son, love it. Perfect size, very soft, and it 100% Mickey Mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Majami

customer_reviews.title: Good sized stuffed toy!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several of these off here and in stores for gifts and they are always great! A decent size so they don't get lost or hidden by other toys. Hold up well too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ross

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect.  Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. High quality. And of course great service by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: John Young

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cute mickey plush
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and soft mickey 2 yr old grandson loves to take him to bed
customer_reviews.author: Rose M

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his Mickey, He walks around with it all day and sleeps with it
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Reed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a one and a half year old and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any Mickey lover!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 1 year old as part of his birthday present and he hugs it all throughout the day. Perfect size and so soft!
customer_reviews.author: Katy Malone

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Mickey started to rip about a week in to having him
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sweet

customer_reviews.title: nice and soft Mickey for todler.
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren loved this Mickey. They even sleep with him. Very nice size Mickey for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Myriam

customer_reviews.title: Too Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 2 year old. He loves Mickey Mouse and thought it would be fun. We just it as a diaper bag. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my special needs Granddaughter, and she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Joann M Fowler

customer_reviews.title: No tags or packaging
customer_reviews.text: It was great except I purchased as a present and it did not have tags or come in any kind of packaging
customer_reviews.author: Jami Lee Lawfield

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived as expected. It is well made and my child loves it.
customer_reviews.author: hethr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful teddy Mickey Mouse
customer_reviews.text: My son loves teddy. Is beautiful and of very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: David

product_meta.title: Disney Classic Mickey Medium Plush
feature_bullets: This product ships in a polybag.
This soft and cuddly Mickey Mouse Plush is as adorable as ever.
Comes dressed in his signature red shorts.
